snippet: The league’s deputy commissioner met with employees of the team Saturday to soothe tensions amid uncertainty about the future of the team’s leadership.
abstract: NBA announces that it will soon appoint a chief executive to oversee operations of the Los Angeles Clippers in an attempt to create stability in the wake of the Donald Sterling scandal.
lead_paragraph: The league’s deputy commissioner met with employees of the team Saturday to soothe tensions amid uncertainty about the future of the team’s leadership.

headline.main: League Is Set to Appoint a C.E.O. for the Clippers
headline.print_headline: League Is Set to Appoint a C.E.O. for the Clippers
